attributes.action: Call for a referendum NOW to Leave or Stay in the EU!
attributes.background: The UK is bursting at the seams. We can't take care of our homeless and people living in poverty. We can't keep giving free homes food and benefit's to immigrants who haven't paid a penny into the system. We need a vote now before it's to late!

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105863

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
